quoteFirst: The Hayden Survey reported feeling severe shocks near Steamboat Point on Yellowstone Lake in 1871. They named the site “Earthquake Camp.” Other quakes have been reported, mostly of a minor nature. At
quoteLast: on August 17, 1959, an earthquake of magnitude 7.1 on the Richter Scale struck the Yellowstone area.
title: The Story of Man In Yellowstone
author: Beal, Merrill D., 1898-1990
